archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: LIMS System
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Laboratory Information Management Systems orchestrate the complex workflow of clinical laboratories, managing everything from specimen collection to result reporting. LIMS tracks specimens through unique identifiers from collection to disposal, manages test orders and protocols, and interfaces with various laboratory instruments for automated result capture. The system handles quality control procedures, manages reagent inventory and expiration dates, and ensures compliance with laboratory regulations and accreditation standards. LIMS provides result validation workflows, manages reference ranges and critical values, and generates comprehensive reports for clinical staff while maintaining audit trails for regulatory compliance.
Core Functionalities: • Sample lifecycle management • Lab test ordering and result entry • Automated instrument integration • Quality control and auditing • Reporting and analytics
Workflows: • Test order → Sample collection → Test execution → Result verification → Result dispatch
Data Types: • Lab tests, specimens, control charts, test results, normal ranges
Integration Points: • EHR: To send and receive lab orders/results • HIS: For test billing • ERP: For reagent and supply management
Example Software: • Sunquest LIMS • Orchard Harvest • LabWare • STARLIMS (Abbott)
